        public java.lang.Boolean preShoot​(java.util.List<java.util.List<Player>> targetLists,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> effects,
                                  java.util.List<Cell> cells)
                           throws DifferentPlayerNeededException,
                                  WeaponNotLoadedException,
                                  PlayerAlreadyDeadException,
                                  PlayerInSameCellException,
                                  PlayerInDifferentCellException,
                                  UncorrectDistanceException,
                                  SeeAblePlayerException,
                                  UncorrectEffectsException,
                                  NotCorrectPlayerNumberException,
                                  PlayerNotSeeableException,
                                  NotEnoughAmmoException,
                                  CellNonExistentException
        This method will check if the player can shoot
        Specified by:
        preShoot in class SpecialWeapons
        Parameters:
        targetLists - is a list of list of target for each effect of the weapon
        effects - is a list containing int correspondents to which effect will be used
        cells - is a list of cell
        Returns:
        true if the shoot can be preformed, false otherwise

      • checkBaseEffect

        private java.lang.Boolean checkBaseEffect​(java.util.List<Player> targets)
                                   throws NotCorrectPlayerNumberException,
                                          UncorrectDistanceException
        This method will check if the parameters for the base shot are valid
        Parameters:
        targets - is the list of targets
        Returns:
        true if the parameters are validated
        Throws:
        NotCorrectPlayerNumberException - if the targets are more than one
        UncorrectDistanceException - if the target is not in a cell adj to the shooter's one

      • checkSecondEffect

        private java.lang.Boolean checkSecondEffect​(java.util.List<Player> targets)
                                     throws NotEnoughAmmoException,
                                            NotCorrectPlayerNumberException,
                                            UncorrectDistanceException
        This method will check if the parameters for the second effect shot are valid
        Parameters:
        targets - is the list of targets
        Returns:
        true if the parameters are validated
        Throws:
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player could not pay for the second effect
        NotCorrectPlayerNumberException - if the specified targets are not 1 nor 2
        UncorrectDistanceException - if the targets are not in aline of adj cells
